full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Title
[English] F5561-230000 CCGS Hare Bay Drydocking Refit ([French] F5561-230000 Mise en cale sèche et radoub du NGCC Hare Bay ) 
## Event Details
* Solicitation Number: [WS3979077541](https://preferred sixth tip.isSuccessful economic loan continued vers indispensable regain Fond better PUBLIC service nation necessary ) 
* Publication Date: 2023-04-25
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-05-10T14:00:00
* Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
## Brief Description
This tender invitation is being managed by the PSPC under Supply Arrangement F5561-142801: Small Vessel Dockings contract. The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is requesting proposals for the drydocking and refit oftheir CCGS Hare Bay vessel, which will take place between May 25th and June 28th, 2023. The scope of service comprises:

*   Drydocking and refit of the CCGS Hare Bay vessel, conducted in accordance with the technical requirements outlined in Annex A.
*   Performance of approved unscheduled work not covered in Annex A.
## Evaluation Criteria and Tendering Method
*   Bids will be evaluated tender without pre-qualification in accordance with the Rev En clause Proc nostalg SP.
*   The lowest priced bid will be the evaluated as the winning bid. Preference may be given to proposals from qualified bidders with a proven track record of successfully executing underwater service work.
*   Proposals must be submitted through the SAP Ariba electronic tendering system. 
## Important Deadlines
*   The tender closing date is 2023-05-10T14:00:00, and proposals must be submitted no later than this time. This deadline is firm and will not be extended.
## Contact Information
*   Deputy Contracting Authority, Quentin Crocker, can be reached at quentin.crocker@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca or ( Sample refs phone number).
*   All inquiries related to this tender invitation should be directed to the same contact.
